column4: hello everyone i've installed ubuntu but i am having some sound issues here. I do have sound but i cannot manage it from the desktop (volume icon) ... maybe someone had the same problem and maybe can give me a hand..rgds
press F2 and write: "gnome-volume-control". Do you see the volume control?
Maybe you need to adjust your settings in "System>Preferences>Sound"
or in the gnome-volume-control try: File>Change Device
